question: Microsoft and this have entered into a partnership to develop industry first innovations on Microsoft's Cloud platform.
explanation: Microsoft & Paisabazaar.com have entered into a partnership to develop industry first innovations on Microsoft's Cloud platform using artificial intelligence & machine learning. The collaboration would help Paisabazaar identify customer needs more accurately, factoring in their lifestyle & life-stage. It would also expedite processes on Paisabazaar platform through automation & digitisation.
